columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user.

columns.name: user_level
columns.description: Classification level of the user (e.g., 'Level 4', 'Exec Level 1').

columns.name: agency
columns.description: The Australian Public Service agency the user belongs to.

learning_content.description: Stores information about learning courses and content.

columns.name: surrogate_key
columns.description: Unique identifier for the learning content item.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the course or learning content.

columns.name: content_id
columns.description: Original content identifier, if different from surrogate_key.

columns.name: content_type
columns.description: Type of learning content (e.g., 'Course', 'Video', 'Live Learning').

columns.name: target_level
columns.description: The intended APS audience level for the content (e.g., 'Level 3', 'All Levels').

columns.name: governing_bodies
columns.description: Governing body or authority for the content (e.g., 'APSC', 'APS Academy').

attendance.description: Tracks user attendance and status for learning content.

columns.name: attendance_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the attendance record.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Identifier for the user attending.

columns.name: learning_content_surrogate_key
columns.description: Identifier for the learning content being attended.

columns.name: date_effective
columns.description: The effective date of the attendance status (e.g., enrollment date, completion date).

columns.name: status
columns.description: Enrollment status (e.g., 'Completed', 'Enrolled', 'Cancelled').

evaluations.description: Stores responses from post-course evaluation surveys. Based on the refactored mock data generated.

columns.name: response_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the evaluation response.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Identifier for the user who submitted the evaluation.

columns.name: learning_content_surrogate_key
columns.description: Identifier for the course being evaluated.

columns.name: course_end_date
columns.description: Date the participant attended/completed the course.

columns.name: course_delivery_type
columns.description: How the course was delivered (e.g., 'In-person', 'Virtual', 'Blended').

columns.name: agency
columns.description: Participant's agency (denormalized, also available via users.user_id).

columns.name: attendance_motivation
columns.description: Reasons for attending (multi-choice, semicolon-separated string). Options: 'To improve my performance...', 'To develop for a future role...', etc.

columns.name: positive_learning_experience
columns.description: Likert scale (1-5) rating for positive learning experience.

columns.name: effective_use_of_time
columns.description: Likert scale (1-5) rating for effective use of time.

columns.name: relevant_to_work
columns.description: Likert scale (1-5) rating for relevance to work.

columns.name: did_experience_issue
columns.description: Issues experienced (multi-choice, semicolon-separated string, includes 'None of the above'). Options: 'Technical difficulties...', 'Learning resources poorly designed...', etc.

columns.name: did_experience_issue_detail
columns.description: Free-text details if an issue was reported.

columns.name: facilitator_skills
columns.description: Skills demonstrated by the facilitator (multi-choice, semicolon-separated string, includes 'None of the above'). Options: 'Displayed strong knowledge...', 'Communicated clearly...', etc.

columns.name: had_guest_speakers
columns.description: Whether the course included guest speakers ('Yes'/'No').

columns.name: guest_contribution
columns.description: How guest speakers enhanced learning (multi-choice, semicolon-separated string, includes 'The contributions... did not enhance learning'). Conditional on 'had_guest_speakers'. Options: 'Strengthened understanding...', 'Enhanced relevance...', etc.

columns.name: knowledge_level_prior
columns.description: Participant's self-assessed knowledge level before the course (e.g., 'Novice', 'Beginner', 'Expert').

columns.name: course_application
columns.description: Ways the course prepared participant to apply learning (multi-choice, semicolon-separated string, includes 'Other'). Options: 'Opportunity to practice...', 'Prompted reflection...', etc.

columns.name: course_application_other
columns.description: Free-text details if 'Other' selected for course_application.

columns.name: course_application_timeframe
columns.description: When the participant plans to apply learning (e.g., 'Immediately', 'Within the next month', 'I am not sure').

columns.name: general_feedback
columns.description: Any other free-text feedback from the participant.
